content: discover the joy of crocheting with our skipping stones washcloth crochet pattern this digital pattern download introduces you to the mesmerizing pebble stitch creating a textured masterpiece that s both practical and beautiful ideal for crocheters of all skill levels this pattern offers clear instructions written and links to both right and left handed video tutorials and helpful tips to ensure success with every stitch crafted from high-quality cotton yarn this washcloth is hypoallergenic and gentle on the skin making it suitable for individuals of all ages its easy-care nature allows for hassle-free laundering ensuring long-lasting freshness and hygiene download your pdf copy today and add a touch of handmade elegance to your home or gift collection whether you re a seasoned pro or just starting your crochet journey the skipping stones washcloth pattern promises hours of relaxation and satisfaction as you create something truly special **materials ** any 4 weight cotton yarn of your choosing i used approximately 60 yards 5mm hook scissors tapestry needle stitch markers optional to mark first or last stitch of the row **abbreviations used ** chain s --chain s st s --stitch es repeat--repeat double_crochet--double_crochet single_crochet--single_crochet slip_stitch--slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet ps pebble stitch fhdc foundation half_double_crochet optional - there is also instructions for a regular chain start *to* - repeat between the * and * fo fasten_off yo yarn over
